thread.title: Deanna in NYC
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Deanna in NYC

author: Deanna in NYC
title: Deanna in NYC
text: I have been more than happy with Burgers for years now. I believe their products are superior and their service stellar. My freezer currently has several boxes of stuffed chicken breasts that save me so much trouble when I need dinner in a hurry. Just thaw in a pan of water then bake for 35 minutes. And their ham (we choose NOT sliced) has been a favorite in our extended family for many Easters and some Christmases.
